name.jp: シャイニングウェーブ

desc.gl:
2-hit ranged BRV attack + HP attack
BRV damage increased based on total resistance value of party's active Shield effects
Greatly restores party's HP based on HP damage dealt
Recovery limit: 10% of MAX HP
HP recovered in excess of MAX HP added to BRV
Moderately increases SPD for 5 turns
desc.jp:
2HIT遠距離物理BRV攻撃＋HP攻撃
味方全員に付与されている「シールド」の
総耐久値に応じてBRV威力アップ
与えたHPダメージに応じて味方全員のHP大回復
回復量の上限は それぞれの最大HPの10％分
対象の最大HPを超えてHPが回復した時
超えたHP分 対象のBRVに加算
5ACTION自身の素早さを中アップ
素早さアップ（非表示）

name.jp: バフブーストガードアップ

short_desc.gl: Buff Boost Guard: Raises MAX BRV, DEF
short_desc.jp: バフブーストガードアップ：最大BRVと防御力がアップ

desc.gl:
Shining Shield use +2

When using Shining Shield:
 • Grants target 50% INT BRV before BRV multiplier, extended to party
 • Moderate boost to target's BRV multiplier, extended to party
 • Shield extended to party
 • MAX BRV Up extended to party, becomes Will of Light (slightly raises ATK; BRV Regen effect)
 • Triggers additional HP attack after use

While Will of Light active:
 • BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ (BRV attack hit count becomes 2; moderately increased cumulative BRV damage)
 • HP Attack becomes HP Attack+ (increases BRV based on INT BRV before HP attack)

While Will of Light active and party's total Shield count 3:
 • BRV Attack+ becomes BRV Attack++ (moderate BRV damage boost)
 • HP Attack+ becomes HP Attack++ (becomes melee BRV attack + HP attack; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%)
desc.jp: A

short_desc.gl: Shining Shield Extension: Boost to Shining Shield
short_desc.jp: A

name.jp: バフアタックブーストアップ

desc.gl: Moderately raises MAX BRV, ATK with active buffs
desc.jp: 自身に強化効果が付与されている時\n自身の最大BRVと攻撃力を中アップ

short_desc.gl: Buffed Attack Boost Up: Raises MAX BRV, ATK
short_desc.jp: バフアタックブーストアップ：最大BRVと攻撃力がアップ

desc.gl:
When using Throw Buckler:
 • Grants party BRV based on own INT BRV before BRV attack
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 4; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%
 • Self: 5 turns Will of Light
 • Triggers additional HP attack after use
